statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 15 \\ -16 \\ 11 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 22 \\ -51 \\ 54 \\ -39 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
